org.ipdr.api.configuration
Class ExporterConfigBase

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.api.configuration.ExporterConfigBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExporterConfigI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExporterConfigXml
public abstract class ExporterConfigBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExporterConfigI

The class provides a convenient base for ExporterConfigI implementations
